column5: Planning to hit BOQ tomorrow, since my auger is broken, decided to fish 1 more time before my reading week is over. Anyone recommand good ice hut rental? I would really like to catch my first hardwater walleye. I understand its more likely to catch something with a guide, is it much more expensive?
Try going with Hawg Hunter through Carra Outdoor in Belleville.  From the pictures and reports on here, you will not be going home empty handed.  His rate are decent I think for what you get.
